General.Name: Metemtur Yatırım Enerji Turizm ve İnşaat A.Ş.
General.Description: Metemtur Yatirim Enerji Turizm ve Insaat Anonim Sirketi operates a holiday village in Bodrum Gümbet, Turkey. The company is involved in the construction and sale of Fugayaz Gündogan houses; and generation and sale of electricity through solar power plants. Metemtur Yatirim Enerji Turizm ve Insaat Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Beyaz Karanfil Sokak No:13, Istanbul, Turkey
